name: Nanowars
summary: Crysis 2 NanoWARS -Is a mod that focuses on combining & balancing elements and items from the entire Crysis Universe into one Multiplayer experience while also adding NEW items/weapons/maps that were made by the community. We do our best to "keep it interesting" so sometimes new skins or seasonal content will be available for the players. NanoWars has been the Flagship mod that has kept the Crysis 2 MP experience going. From a simple attachments mod to an expansive community, NanoWars has grown over the years because of dedicated players like YOU!!!
